enchantment.lightmanscurrency.money_mend: Repairs the item using money from your wallet.
enchantment.lightmanscurrency.coin_magne: Lets your wallet collect coins from a larger range.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.beta: Feature in beta stage. May have issues!
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.item.2: Can be used to Sell, Purchase, or Barter items with other players.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.item.ar: Can be used to Sell, Purchase, or Barter armor pieces with other players.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.item.ti: Can be used to Sell, Purchase, or Barter tickets and ticket materials with other players.
A master ticket is required in order to sell tickets.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.network: Can be used to Sell, Purchase, or Barter items with other players from any location.
Can only be accessed via a Trading Terminal.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.atm.1: Can exchange coins for other coins of higher or lower values.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.atm.2: Can deposit or withdraw coins from your bank account.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.atm.3: Can access any Team bank accounts you have access to.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.atm.4: Can transfer money from your account to another player or teams account.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.coinmint.minta: Can mint coins from their base materials.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.coinmint.melta: Can melt coins back into their base materials.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.interface.item: Can be used to automatically purchase or sell items from any network item trader.
Can be used to automatically drain or restock from a network item trader you have permission to.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.paygate.2: Can be used to trigger a redstone signal for a price.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.paygate.3: Can be linked to a ticket for easier customer interactions.
Can be used to print unique Master and Slave tickets.
Tickets can be used with the Paygate, or used as coupons for barter trades.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.cashregister.1: Can be used to link and interact with multiple local traders at the same time.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.auction.cancel: Will cancel the auction. The latest bid will be refunded, and your items will be returned to your inventory.
Will cancel the auction. The latest bid will be refunded, and your items will be sent to your storage.
gui.lightmanscurrency.atm.title: ATM
gui.lightmanscurrency.coinmint.title: Coin Mint
gui.lightmanscurrency.trading.title: %1$s (%2$s)
gui.lightmanscurrency.warning.nbt.sellin: NBT is NOT enforced. Item may have unexpected NBT data.
gui.lightmanscurrency.item_edit.title: Item Selection
Shift + R-Click on a trader to register.
Cash Register is not linked to any traders.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.wallet.pickup: Automatically collects any coins that you pick up.
Can collect coins up to %sm away.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.wallet.manualC: Can exhange coins manually in the UI.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.wallet.bankacc: Can deposit or withdraw coins to/from your bank account in the UI.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.upgrade.item_c: Increases item trader storage capacity by %s.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.upgrade.speed: Decreases the delay between interactions by %s ticks.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.upgrade.networ: Makes a trader visible from a trading terminal.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.upgrade.hopper: Allows the block to collect inputs from its neighboring containers.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.wallet.convert: Exchange Coinage For Highest Value Coin
gui.button.lightmanscurrency.playerlimit: Clears the memory of how many trades have been handled.
gui.button.lightmanscurrency.free_sample: Forgets who has received their free sample so that they may receive it again.
gui.button.lightmanscurrency.price_fluct: Randomly increases or decreases the price by up to %1$s%% of the base price every %2$s.
trader.warning.reinitialized: Trader Data was missing for this block. Re-initializing the trader with you as the owner!

lightmanscurrency.message.persistent.auc: Error occurred when attempting to add the Persistent Auction.

Create a Persistent Auction with the given data.
log.settings.addremovetrade: %1$s %2$s a trade slot. Trader now has %3$s trades.

gui.bank.transfer.error.null.to: Target bank account does not exist.

gui.lightmanscurrency.notification.detai: You will receive a notification if your account balance goes below %s.
gui.lightmanscurrency.notification.disab: You will not receive any account balance notifications.

lightmanscurrency.remotetrade.fail.notsu: This trader does not support trader interfaces.
lightmanscurrency.remotetrade.fail.null: The trade or trader no longer exists.

command.lightmanscurrency.lcadmin.trader: Trader does not have a whitelist trade rule. Cannot add players to the whitelist.
command.lightmanscurrency.lcadmin.setCus: Saved current trader data to the block entity. Can now be copied to a structure or schematic safely.
command.lightmanscurrency.lcadmin.giftBa: No bank accounts received your gift!
command.lightmanscurrency.lcadmin.replac: Item given was not a valid wallet item or air!

command.argument.trader.notfound: Could not find a trader with the given ID.
command.trader.block.notfound: No trader block at the given position.
lightmanscurrency.jei.info.ticket: Crafted in the Ticket Station using a printed Master Ticket and a valid ticket material.
lightmanscurrency.jei.info.ticket_master: Crafted in the Ticket Station using a valid ticket material. Each Master Ticket will have a unique id to prevent illegal ticket copying, and must be used to define ticket interactions.
lightmanscurrency.jei.info.ticket_stub: A broken ticket returned to the customer when a ticket is used on a Paygate.
advancements.lightmanscurrency.root.desc: Collecting wealth and trading with players.
advancements.lightmanscurrency.wallet_cr: Craft your first wallet. You can use these to store your coins!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.netherite: Craft a netherite wallet, the largest and most resilient wallet around!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.enchanted: Enchant your wallet with the Coin Magnet enchantment.
advancements.lightmanscurrency.atm.title: Now you're thinking with Banking
advancements.lightmanscurrency.atm.descr: Craft an ATM Machine. You can use this to exchange coins and access your bank account.
advancements.lightmanscurrency.banker_tr: Buy a currency-related item from a banker.
advancements.lightmanscurrency.coin_mint: Craft a Coin Mint, so that you can mint your own coins.
Craft a Trading Terminal. This will let you access network traders from anywhere.
advancements.lightmanscurrency.cash_regi: Craft a cash register, so that players can interact with all of your nearby traders at once!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.trading_c: Craft a Trading Core! These are needed to make trading machines to trade from.
advancements.lightmanscurrency.trader.de: Craft any Item Trader so that you can trade with your friends!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.specialty: Craft a specialty item trader. Be careful, as they have special rules limiting how their trades are defined.
advancements.lightmanscurrency.network_t: Craft a network trader, so that you can sell your items to anyone, anywhere!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.trader_in: Craft a trader interface, so that you can automate trading or restocking with a network trader!
